channel.title: 3D render on Andreas Gajdosik
channel.description: Recent content in 3D render on Andreas Gajdosik

item.title: Caravanitas
item.description: Caravanitas (2023), a series of tourist postcards created for the city of Le Mans, combines the vanitas genre with the interiors and exteriors of contemporary cars through the technique of 3D rendering manipulated by artificial intelligence. It is a meditation on the impermanence not only of the individual but also of entire ecosystems in the context of the climate crisis and the city made famous by the 24 Hours of Le Mans car race.
